title: locked champ (yorick) after buying

replies.body: Looking into this for you, it looks like you used your refund tokens to get IP back from Twitch, Katarina, and Yorick.  The refund will lock the champion, so it would be necessary to purchase him for play.  Hopefully, that helps clear things up!

what is a refund token?.. have i been hacked?
...ok wow

so i found the tabs with refunds 
dident know you could do that 
i think iv been hacked...

iv changed my password and looked more into it
it seems they refunded three champs then bought other champs

why would someone hack me to do this?

well since its not some glitch idk what to do

is there i way to undo this?

they refunded yorick kat and twitch to buy lucian and vayne  
lucian 6300
vayne 4800

yorick 4800
kat 3150
twitch 3150

i feel like this option to refund is hidden
i never knew and iv been playing for years

anyway thank you for looking into it
i dont know how to feel


and i now remeber the popup saying i was loged in on another pc
i dident pay any mind to it a mistake i wont repete
what is a refund token?.. have i been hacked?
